synopsis.text: Deep in the South Pacific, the Keroro Platoon and their friends embark on a well-deserved vacation, only to have their peace shattered when Natsumi is abducted by colossal sea creatures on their first night. Upon awakening, Natsumi finds herself face-to-face with two extraterrestrial beings, Maru and Meru, who declare her their Deep Sea Princess, creating an underwater realm from her memories. As Meru develops feelings for Natsumi, the Keroro Platoon must uncover the true identities of these aliens, rescue Natsumi, and prevent a global flood. Little do they know, the creature gifted to Fuyuki is the enemy of this underwater kingdom, unleashing destructive beasts to eliminate Natsumi and anyone who dares to protect her. Prepare for a thrilling adventure as the Keroro Platoon fights for survival and love in this action-packed anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
